metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15108 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: spice-vdagent up to and including 0.17.0 does not properly escape save directory before passing to shell, allowing local attacker with access to the session the agent runs in to inject arbitrary commands to be executed.

criterions.comment: spice-vdagent: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
